He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later(n)

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely Chicago token collector (Sandra Bullock) pines for a handsome commuter (Peter Gallagher). When she saves his life after a mugging that leaves him comatose, she's mistaken for his fiancee. Playing along, she instead falls in love with her "fiancee's" brother (Bill Pullman), thus setting in motion a decidedly bizarre love triangle. Jack Warden, Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Michael Rispoli, Ally Walker and Monica Keena costar in this romantic comedy that made Bullock a star(n)

programme.title: Bigger Than the Sky
programme.desc: Bored and depressed, a lonely single guy impulsively tries out for a part in a local theater's production of "Cyrano de Bergerac" and lands the lead role. It's an opportunity that leads to a new circle of friends, a new love interest - and a few new problems when his director loses confidence in his acting ability. Marcus Thomas, Amy Smart, John Corbett, Sean Astin and Clare Higgins star in this romantic comedy from actor-turned-director Al Corley(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later(n)

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Worth the Fall
programme.desc: When he witnesses a principal's sexual misconduct toward a student at the middle school where he works, an immigrant janitor must decide whether or not to report the incident - a choice that could get his wife deported(n)

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury(n)

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Parker Posey and Eric McCormack star in this comedy about a couple who set out to build a new home and enlist the services of an uncompromising modernist architect who proceeds to build his dream house, instead of theirs(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first(n)

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork(n)

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder(n)

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with(n)

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama(n)

programme.title: The Great Debaters
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in and directs this inspiring drama about a college professor who challenges the entrenched racism and prejudice of the 1930's by assembling and training a first-class African-American debate team, a talented group that makes its way to a national championship against Harvard University. Forest Whitaker, Jurnee Smollett and Nate Parker costar in this fact-based, critically acclaimed film(n)

programme.title: What About Bob?
programme.desc: Comedy about a troubled but lovable therapy patient, Bob, who seeks help from a noted psychiatrist to find relief from his crippling fears. But when the psychiatrist goes on a quiet family vacation, Bob unexpectedly shows up at his lakeside retreat and won't leave. Stars Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss(n)

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: After she catches her husband cheating on her, a charming, flamboyant socialite packs her two young sons into a Coupe de Ville and embarks on a cross-country journey to find a new head of the family. Renee Zellweger, Logan Lerman and Kevin Bacon star in this comedy-drama loosely based on a true story

programme.title: The Dark Time
programme.desc: Nancy ponders a surprising new potential business partner, while Heylia and Conrad must evacuate their grow house in a panic, Andy takes Dean to play murderball, and Doug sinks to an all-time low

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Strong Sexual Content, Mild Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Risk
programme.desc: Nancy explores her new business arrangement and a new client: a biker gang; Heylia and Vaneeta make the most of their new surroundings; Andy woos a "biker chick," Denise

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Mild Violence

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world

programme.title: Boogie Woogie
programme.desc: The over-hyped, pretentious modern art scene in London is satirized in this dark ensemble comedy about the double dealings and calculated relationships encircling the effort to get an aging collector to part with a valuable painting. Gillian Anderson, Alan Cumming and Heather Graham star

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: After she catches her husband cheating on her, a charming, flamboyant socialite packs her two young sons into a Coupe de Ville and embarks on a cross-country journey to find a new head of the family. Renee Zellweger, Logan Lerman and Kevin Bacon star in this comedy-drama loosely based on a true story

programme.title: Lost Cat Corona
programme.desc: Dominic likes to play it safe, but Dom's M.O. is tested when his wife's cat goes missing and he sets out on a quest to find him. Over the course of one day, Dom endures neighborhood mayhem at every turn. He meets a deranged psychopath, endures a sideshow of a wake, and becomes unwittingly involved in the exchange of illegal knockoff handbags. As the day nears the end, a confrontation with a pair of badass teens forces Dom to face the issues that have been holding him hostage his entire life

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as a man now reunited with the mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her not knowing who or what she is

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as a man now reunited with the mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her not knowing who or what she is

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: At the dawn of the Civil War, the men of Cold Mountain, North Carolina, rush to join the Confederate army. Ada (Nicole Kidman) has vowed to wait for Inman (Jude Law), but as the war drags on and letters go unanswered, she must find the will to survive while desperately struggling to hold onto her family's farm. Inman's long journey home takes him through the crumbling confederacy, as he meets people of all walks of life who both aid and hinder his mission

programme.title: Protection
programme.desc: Nancy deals with an injured Silas and a mentally unstable Shane while deciding how to handle the increasing biker gang threat; Doug continues his war with Sullivan; Celia seeks tutelage from Heylia on the pot business(c)

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: In the Season Three finale, a wildfire forces the residents of Agrestic to evacuate, as authorities question Celia and Sulliva; Conrad, Heylia and Vaneeta say goodbye to their grow house, and Silas realizes the truth about Tara(c)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life(c)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: At the dawn of the Civil War, the men of Cold Mountain, North Carolina, rush to join the Confederate army. Ada (Nicole Kidman) has vowed to wait for Inman (Jude Law), but as the war drags on and letters go unanswered, she must find the will to survive while desperately struggling to hold onto her family's farm. Inman's long journey home takes him through the crumbling confederacy, as he meets people of all walks of life who both aid and hinder his mission

programme.title: Claire in Motion
programme.desc: Three weeks after Claire's husband mysteriously disappears, the police end their investigation. Claire doesn't give up, and soon discovers his troubling secrets, including a graduate student with whom he had formed a close bond. As she digs deeper, Claire begins to lose her grip on how well she truly knew her husband and questions her own identity in the process

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive

programme.title: Two Weeks
programme.desc: A quartet of siblings gather at the North Carolina home of their dying mother, where squabbling, bickering, and ultimately, emotional healing and grace, are in the offing. Sally Field and Ben Chaplin lead the cast of this ensemble comedy-drama, costarring Julianne Nicholson and Tom Cavanagh

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought(n)

programme.title: Mother Thinks The Birds Are After Her
programme.desc: In the Season Four premiere, Nancy and family relocate to the border town of Ren Mar, where Andy's father (and new landlord) awaits; interrogated by the DEA, Doug, Dean and Andy pin the entire grow operation on Celia(n)

programme.title: Lady's A Charm
programme.desc: After getting her family settled in their new home, Nancy turns her attention back to business and gets a crash course in "running" across the Mexican border; Celia adjusts to prison life; Andy confronts his irresponsible father(n)

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Kathy (Academy Award® winner Rachel Weisz) is an American police officer who takes a job working as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia. Her expectations of helping to rebuild a devastated country are dashed when she uncovers a dangerous reality of corruption, cover-up and intrigue, amid a world of private contractors and multinational diplomatic doubletalk. Directed by Larysa Kondracki, the film also stars Academy Award® winner Vanessa Redgrave, Monica Bellucci and Academy Award® nominee David Strathairn(n)

programme.title: Fair Game (2010)
programme.desc: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard(n)

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought(n)

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse(n)

programme.title: Bigger Than the Sky
programme.desc: Bored and depressed, a lonely single guy impulsively tries out for a part in a local theater's production of "Cyrano de Bergerac" and lands the lead role. programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins(n)

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed(n)

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl(n)

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. programme.title: Living Single
programme.desc: Khadijah insists on settling an accident claim civilly---and out of court---until she realizes she's up against a weaselly lawyer (Marcus Giamatti). Judge: Richard Stahl. Mrs. Shortridge: Montrose Hagins. Max: Erika Alexander. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości
